ddf.catalog.source.solr

Class DynamicSchemaResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.source.solr.DynamicSchemaResolver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilteringDynamicSchemaResolver

    public class DynamicSchemaResolver
extends Object
    This class tries to resolve all user given field names to their corresponding dynamic Solr index field name. This class takes most of its logic directly from the configured Solr schema.xml. For instance, the suffixes enumerated in this class are directly copied from the schema.xml.
    Since:
    0.2.0

    • Method Detail

      • addFieldsFromClient

        public void addFieldsFromClient(org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrClient client)
        Adds the fields that are already in Solr to the cache. This method should be called once the SolrClient is up to ensure the cache is synchronized with Solr.
        Parameters:
        client - the SolrClient we are working with

      • addFields

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • resolveFieldName

        public String resolveFieldName(String solrFieldName)
        PRE-CONDITION is that fieldname cannot be null.

        The convention is that we add a suffix starting with an underscore, so if we find the last underscore, then we can return the original field name.

        Parameters:
        solrFieldName - Solr index field name
        Returns:
        the original field name

      • isPrivateField

        public boolean isPrivateField(String solrFieldName)

      • getAnonymousField

        public List<String> getAnonymousField(String field)
        Attempts to resolve the name of a field without being given an AttributeType.AttributeFormat
        Parameters:
        field - user given field name
        Returns:
        a list of possible Solr field names that match the given field. If none are found, then an empty list is returned

      • getField

        public String getField(String propertyName,
                       AttributeType.AttributeFormat format,
                       boolean isSearchedAsExactValue)
        Attempts to find the fieldName for the given propertyName value.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - property name provided by user
        format - AttributeType.AttributeFormat that describes the type of Attribute the field is
        isSearchedAsExactValue - specifies if any special index suffixes need to be added to the field
        Returns:
        the proper schema field name. If a schema name cannot be found in cache, returns a schema field name that matches the dynamic field type formatting.

      • getFieldSuffix

        public String getFieldSuffix(AttributeType.AttributeFormat format)

      • parseTextFrom

        protected List<String> parseTextFrom(List<Serializable> xmlDatas)
        Given xml as a string, this method will parse out element text and CDATA text. It separates each by one space character.
        Parameters:
        xmlDatas - List of XML as String
        Returns:
        parsed CDATA and element text
